page.title: 07DAWLEY STREET MARKET
page.content: Every{Friday}a{Market}comes to{Dawley. The market starts at about 9.30 a.m. and ends at 3.30 p.m. The stalls sell mainly{clothes}and{household goods. They mostly sell their goods at low prices. Stall holders come from all over the{West Midlands. }They get their goods from all over{England. They go to{Markets}in the{West {Midlands}and as far as the{Mid Wales Coast.Most of them have only 1 or 2 stalls. Business is growing on{Dawley {Market.}Most stalls get roughly over 100 customers a day. Dawley Market is very popular.
